name: luascript
description: High-performance JavaScript-to-Lua transpiler with advanced runtime optimization - $1M Competitive Implementation

scripts.test:phase1: node -e "const {ComprehensiveTestSuite} = require('./test/test_phase1_6_comprehensive.js'); const suite = new ComprehensiveTestSuite(); suite.runPhase1Tests();"
scripts.test:phase2: node -e "const {ComprehensiveTestSuite} = require('./test/test_phase1_6_comprehensive.js'); const suite = new ComprehensiveTestSuite(); suite.runPhase2Tests();"
scripts.test:enterprise: node -e "const {ComprehensiveTestSuite} = require('./test/test_phase1_6_comprehensive.js'); const suite = new ComprehensiveTestSuite(); suite.runPhase5EnterpriseTests();"
scripts.test:production: node -e "const {ComprehensiveTestSuite} = require('./test/test_phase1_6_comprehensive.js'); const suite = new ComprehensiveTestSuite(); suite.runPhase6ProductionTests();"
scripts.test:victory: node -e "const {ComprehensiveTestSuite} = require('./test/test_phase1_6_comprehensive.js'); const suite = new ComprehensiveTestSuite(); suite.runVictoryValidation();"
scripts.benchmark: node -e "const {ProductionRuntime} = require('./src/phase6_production_deployment.js'); const runtime = new ProductionRuntime(); console.log('Benchmark ready');"
